ajeffrey.teaching.debug

Interface StepDebugLogic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Subject

    public interface StepDebugLogic
extends Subject
    The logic behind a step debug GUI. This logic includes the Gang of Four's Observer/Observed pattern. Whenever the state of the object changes, it will notify any observers which are attached to it.
    Version:
    v1.0.1
    Author:
    Alan Jeffrey

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static StepDebugLogicFactory factory
      A factory for building step debugger logic.

    • Field Detail

      • factory

        static final StepDebugLogicFactory factory
        A factory for building step debugger logic.

    • Method Detail

      • waitWhilePaused

        void waitWhilePaused()
        If we are currently in pause mode, then block, waiting for us to enter step or run mode. Then, if we are in step mode, set the debugger back to pause mode.

      • pauseMode

        void pauseMode()
        Put the debugger in pause mode.

        Put the debugger in run mode.
